function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid population growth leading to increased demand for housing and congested urban areas","Impact":"Increased risk of vector-borne diseases due to increased vector-human interaction","Mitigation":"Plan urban development to consider public health impacts and implement vector control measures","Technologies":"GIS mapping for urban planning, mosquito surveillance technologies","People":"Residents of congested urban areas","Owner":"Urban planners and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Increase in warm or hot days coupled with flooding creating more breeding sites for mosquito larvae","Impact":"Increased risk of mosquito-borne diseases such as malaria","Mitigation":"Implement flood control measures and vector surveillance in flooded areas","Technologies":"Flood warning systems, mosquito surveillance technologies","People":"Residents in flood-prone areas","Owner":"Government authorities and disaster management agencies"},{"Description":"Exploitation of resources contributing to climate change and air pollution","Impact":"Compromised immunity to other diseases and increased risk of respiratory and cardiovascular illnesses","Mitigation":"Transition to cleaner energy sources, stricter pollution control measures, and public health awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Renewable energy technology, air quality monitoring systems","People":"General population","Owner":"Government authorities and environmental agencies"}]}
